result.execSummary:
The defendant Michael T. Dewey was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Michael T. Dewey is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Michael T. Dewey was found guilty of 1st Degree Sexual Assault of Child, a class B felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.02(1).
  • Michael T. Dewey was found guilty of Exposing Genitals to Child, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 948.10(1).
  • Michael T. Dewey was found guilty of Exposing Genitals to Child, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 948.10(1).
  • Michael T. Dewey was found guilty of 1st Degree Sexual Assault of Child without Great Bodily Harm, a class B felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.02(1)(b).
  • Michael T. Dewey was found guilty of Child Enticement-Sexual Contact, a class D felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.07(1).
  • Michael T. Dewey was found guilty of Exposing Genitals to Child, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 948.10(1).
  • Michael T. Dewey was found guilty of Exposing Genitals to Child, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 948.10(1).
  • Michael T. Dewey was found guilty of 1st Degree Sexual Assault of Child, a class B felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.02(1).
  • Michael T. Dewey was found guilty of 1st Degree Sexual Assault of Child, a class B felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.02(1).
  • Michael T. Dewey was found guilty of Exposing Genitals to Child, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 948.10(1).
  • Michael T. Dewey was found guilty of Exposing Genitals to Child, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 948.10(1).
  • Michael T. Dewey was found guilty of 1st Degree Child Sexual Assault - Intercourse with Person under 12, a class B felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.02(1)(b).
  • Michael T. Dewey was found guilty of 1st Degree Child Sexual Assault - Intercourse with Person under 12, a class B felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.02(1)(b).
  • Michael T. Dewey was found guilty of Exposing genitals to a child, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.10(1)(a).
  • Michael T. Dewey was found guilty of Exposing genitals to a child, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.10(1)(a).
  • Michael T. Dewey was found guilty of 1st Degree Child Sex Assault - Sexual Contact with Person under Age of 13, a class B felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.02(1)(e).
  • Michael T. Dewey was found guilty of Child Enticement-Sexual Contact, a class D felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.07(1).
  • Michael T. Dewey was found guilty of Exposing genitals to a child, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.10(1)(a).
  • Michael T. Dewey was found guilty of Exposing genitals to a child, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.10(1)(a).
  • Michael T. Dewey was found guilty of 1st Degree Child Sexual Assault - Intercourse with Person under 16 - Use/Threat of Force/Violence, a class B felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.02(1)(c).
  • Michael T. Dewey was found guilty of Child Enticement-Sexual Contact, a class D felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.07(1).
  • Michael T. Dewey was found guilty of False Imprisonment, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 940.30.
  • Michael T. Dewey was found guilty of Exposing genitals to a child, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.10(1)(a).
  • Michael T. Dewey was found guilty of Exposing genitals to a child, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.10(1)(a).
  • Michael T. Dewey was found guilty of Incest with Child, a class C felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.06(1).
  • Michael T. Dewey was found guilty of 1st Degree Child Sexual Assault - Intercourse with Person under 12, a class B felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.02(1)(b).
  • Michael T. Dewey was found guilty of Incest with Child, a class C felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.06(1).
  • Michael T. Dewey was found guilty of Child Enticement-Sexual Contact, a class D felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.07(1).
  • Michael T. Dewey was found guilty of Exposing Genitals to a Child, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.10(1)(a).
  • Michael T. Dewey was found guilty of Exposing genitals to a child, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.10(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: ***8/23/2018 - JOC AMENDED PER ORDER FILED 8/21/2018 - CONVICTIONS AND SENTENCES ON COUNTS 2, 5, 18, 24, 29 & 31 ARE VACATED AND THE COUNTS ARE DISMISSED.

superMiscConds.notes:
To pay restitution in an amount to be determined; State given 60 days to submit restitution amount and defendant may ask for a restitution hearing.  

Up to 25% of earnings in prison to be applied first to restitution.

No contact with either of the victims or their residences.

Comply with any conditions per agent.

Submit DNA sample and pay DNA surcharge.
